00102             void generatePrimary(G4Event* anEvent) {
00103                 if (enableStartEvent_) {
00104                     if (anEvent->GetEventID() % modulus_ == 0) {
00105                         std::cout << prepend_ << " Start Event " << anEvent->GetEventID() << " " << append_ << std::endl;

00107                 }

00118                     }
00119                 }
